The winhpclib.py module is available with "The Microsoft HPC Pack 2008 R2 SDK
with Service Pack 2":

  http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=26645

The module is in the optional Sample Code package, which is the file named
"HPC2008R2.SampleCode.zip" on the web page.

  HPC2008R2.SampleCode/
    Scheduler/
      REST/
        PythonClient/
          winhpclib.py

The web page states that "the zip files are subject to the license terms for
the SDK".  The SDK's license is in the file "hpc_pack_R2_sp2_license.pdf".
